SLG_Negotiation.value:
I won’t forgive anyone that disturbs the
peace in this area!

If you saw a raging fire heading towards
a crying child, what would you do?
Do you think you can do anything by force?

Would you rather fight a weak enemy or
a strong enemy?

You’re not an enemy?
What on earth...?
It’s good there’s people like this around...

The time for talk is over!
I’ll smash you to bits!
I guess I can hear you out.
Sure, if you need it I’ll give it to you.
This should keep you in the fight.
Why do you wish to fight us?

Doesn’t the tranquil morning air just get
your motor running?

I have something I must protect.
Can you say the same?

Facing a strong opponent sure gets your heart
racing, doesn’t it?

I sometimes get lost in thought by the river.
I wouldn’t give up that time for the world!

I may seem tough, but I actually love to grow
flowers... Is that strange?

A starry sky, or a blue sky.
Which do you prefer?

What is this...
I sense courage from this one...

Heh, I see... I think we’ll get along
just fine.
Hmph... Looks like we don’t see eye-to-eye.

What a creep!
I’ll bury you!

You wanted something, didn’t you?
Go ahead, try me.

You need my strength?
All right.
Here, take it if it’ll help.
In that case, I’ll be seeing you.

Arrrrgh! Grraaaargh!
Anyone else just gets in my way!

Ain’t you a frail-looking thing.
You eating enough meat?

This is my turf!
Leave some food and get outta here!

I want to do nothing but fun things!
You too, right?

Uurrgh... Waiting around makes me wanna
go crazy!

Did you know? Taking a nap after stuffing
your face is just the best!

Graaaargh! Yeah, that’s it!
I know just what you mean!
Nrrrgh... All of your answers are boring!

So, whaddaya want?
Guess I’ll hear ya out.

Oohhhh!
Need my help, do ya?!
Dunno if this’ll help, but take it.
Hey now... Pull yerself together, already!
Man, what a letdown... Ah well, I’m out.

I’d like to avoid a pointless battle,
if possible...

What would you do if someone told you an idea
you believed in was incorrect?

Sometimes you should act on emotion instead
of logic, don’t you think?

If your friend was off causing trouble,
how would you deal with it?

Is wanting quiet time to yourself such
a crime?
How do clouds in the sky look to you?

Looking at innocent monsters really puts your
heart at ease, doesn’t it?
I see, it looks like we’re kindred spirits!

Whoa...
Is this what it means to have common ground?

It looks like you and I can truly
understand each other.
I guess we don’t think alike.
Perhaps it’s our destiny to fight...
What do you want from me?
You are worthy of my allegiance.
Then I’ll give this to you.
This power... May it provide you nourishment.
I see... In that case, I bid you farewell.

Inferior creature, surrender and you may
yet live!

Supreme beings can’t be understood by others.
But that doesn’t mean I’m lonely or anything!

Some things in this world cannot be
overturned... Do you know of what I speak?

It’s hard to believe there are monsters out
there that coexist with humans...

Those whose positions waver from little more
than words do not amount to much.

Do you like the moon? The sight of a full
moon is so heartwarming, don’t you think?

What would you say is your favorite
expression?
Ho ho ho, your answers please me!

Hmph, I admit I’m impressed...
You are deserving of praise!

I see, so this is how humans are? 
Fascinating...
...I see, so that’s what you amount to.
It was pointless to expect anything of merit.

Harumph! It seems I cannot understand
such an inferior being after all!

I shall heed a single request.
You’ve earned it!

...Very well.
But do not disappoint me, you hear?
If you want it so badly, you can have it!

Very well, I suppose you deserve this
handout.

I don’t care how tough you are,
I’m not gonna lose!
What do you do for fun?
Someday I’m gonna run this joint!
Not if I can help it.
Have you ever told a lie?
What’s the most important thing to you?

Whenever I meet a scary monster, I just start
apologizing. Weird, right?
Well now, I think you and I can get along!
I like you! Today I found a new soul mate!
You’re trying to make me angry, aren’t you?
Now I’m mad! Get ready for some pain!
Hey, don’t you think I’m cute?

Why are you staring at me like that?
Did I upset you...?

Watch your feet!
There’s a little bug down there!

La la laaa laaaaa ♪
Come on, sing with me!

If you could have any wish granted,
what would it be?

I’m sick of fighting.
Can we play something else?
I just adore that red thing on your head!

Wow, you’re more cool than I thought
you’d be!

Hee hee!
Now I’m interested in you!

Now that’s just mean!
You’re making me mad!

I’ll do whatever I can to help!
Just name it. ♪
Hey, what kinda food do ya like?
Whaddaya think’d be good as my next prank?
I don’t feel so good... Someone, help...

...Pffft, ha ha ha, just kidding!
Did I getcha?!
Don’t you think every day’s just sooo boring?
Go on... Try guessing what I think of ya!

Boy, you’re a tough-lookin’ mug, aren’t ya?!
I bet I’d lose if we threw down...

I don’t care if you smile, or laugh, or
whatever! I ain’t gonna trust no human!

Huh.
I get the feeling we’re on the same page.
Nice, I’m all pumped up now!

Wah ha ha!
Seriously, you’re the best!

Enough already!
Don’t you ever talk to me again, y’hear?!

So, what’s the word?
G’wan, spit it out.
Fiiine, fine, I’ll go along with you.

The goal of this battle is to test each
other’s strength.
Are there bonds stronger than the family?

It’s better to take some sort of action than
just sit idly by and worry.
By the way, why exactly are you here?
What kind of human are you?

What do you think is the most important thing
for building trust?

Is there something you’d like to say to me?
Go on, don’t be shy.

There’s no question, you and I are comrades
bound by a strong bond!

Well, it seems we cannot come to
a consensus...
I guess we’ll never understand each other...

I’ve reach the end of my rope.
Unforgivable!

What is your wish?
I shall grant it.
Very well, I shall go with you.
I’m happy to have met you. Many thanks.
(The monster seems to be pleading hungrily.)
(The monster has taken a threatening stance!)

(The monster seems perplexed by the sight of
a human.)
(The monster looks away, as if bored.)
(The monster thrashes about on the spot.)
(The monster seems a bit calmer than before.)
(The monster is flying into a rage!)
(The monster seems mad enough to go crazy!)

(The monster seems to be waiting on you...
Maybe it would hear you out?)
(Looks like the monster will go with you!)

(The monster joyfully hands something
to you.)
(The monster looks warily in this direction.)

(The monster seems interested in what the
humans are saying.)

(The monster is staring in fascinated
confusion.)
(The monster is trying to say something.)

(The monster shakes its head as it starts
to leave.)
(The monster bends forward, scowling at you.)
(The monster is even more on edge.)

(The monster looks like it could attack
at any moment!)

(The monster seems to expect something from
Takuma. You can ask for something now.)
(The monster is ready to accompany you.)
(The monster tries to give you something.)

Hey now!
Got time to hear me sing?
Well ain’t you cute! I wanna eat you up!

Man, something’s bugging me real bad.
Can you guess what it is?

I’ll teach you how to walk a mile in my
shoes. Ya dig?

Hey now, you don’t think you can beat
lil’ ole me, do ya?
Wanna know the secret to this bangin’ bod?

Ain’t you a hoot!
I think I like ya!
Oohhh baby, I’m stuck on you!

Whoaaa, daddy-o! Now that’s what I’m talkin’
about!

That’s it, pal!
Now or never, knock it off!

Now I’m mad... A little less conversation.
I’ll put you in traction!

Just name your game, brother, I’ll show
ya the love!
Hot dang! Let’s get in gear!

Fine, fine, just don’t tell the others,
right? They’ll hound me, dog!

Pain, pain, go away!
Time to go our separate ways!
Until we meet again, my friend!

Well then, would you do the honor of
revealing your impression of me?

I may not look it, but I have many tales
of daring-do under my belt!

Nothing ever comes for free, wouldn’t you
agree?
I take what I can get.

I wasn’t born yesterday, you know?
You can’t fool me!

Things have gotten quite perilous around here
lately.

Isn’t it annoying when someone asks you for
a funny story out of the blue?
You really get me, don’t you?

Looks like you and me are on the same
wavelength.

I am pleased to inform you that you have
curried my favor!
You’re an obstinate one, aren’t you?

I have concluded that cooperation with you
is impossible.
You and I have no relationship to speak of.

Is there perhaps something I could do for
you?

If my abilities would be of assistance,
allow me to make use of them.
Well then, would something like this suffice?

An easy feat. Behold, your injuries
are healed!
Until next we meet, some time, somewhere!

Let’s make a deal:
Throw the fight and I’ll give you an item!

You sure like to puff out your chest around
a weak monster like myself.

Who do you think is worse? The deceiver,
or the deceived?

Trying to pick a fight with a peace-lover
like me... You humans sure are cruel.

You may think of those around you as friends, 
but perhaps you’re actually alone?

I bet you’ve got some secrets, huh?
Go on, tell me one! I dare you!

What do you think decides what’s right
or wrong?

Heh, all right, I admit it.
I had a little fun.
Now you’ve got my motor running!

Heeee hee hee! It’s encounters like this
that make me keep fighting.
Man, what a bore you turned out to be. Shame.

You’re the type I just can’t take,
y’know that?

Unacceptable!
I’ll never give in to you, not ever!
So what do you want? Go on, I can tell...

You’ve got a good eye!
I’ll make your wish come true.

You want this, do you?
Fair enough, it’s all yours.

Seriously, though?
Fine, but just this once.
Doesn’t seem to be in the mood to talk...

Shoot, almost had it! Now it’s off in
the wind somewhere.
